articles.title: World-first trial of gene therapy to cure form of deafness begins - Financial Times
articles.description: Children from the UK, Spain and the US are being recruited in bid to transform treatment of auditory neuropathy
articles.content:
A world-first trial of a gene therapy to cure a form of deafness has begun, potentially heralding a revolution in the treatment of hearing loss.
